mapper.insert: insert into appointment_info (ID, APPOINTMENT_DATE, APPOINTMENT_TIME_FRAME, ORDER_NUM_SUM, ORDER_NUM_NOW) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appointmentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{appointmentTimeFrame,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNumSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNumNow,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into appointment_info
ID,
APPOINTMENT_DATE,
APPOINTMENT_TIME_FRAME,
ORDER_NUM_SUM,
ORDER_NUM_NOW,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{appointmentDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{appointmentTimeFrame,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderNumSum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orderNumNow,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update appointment_info
APPOINTMENT_DATE = #{appointmentDate,jdbcType=DATE},
APPOINTMENT_TIME_FRAME = #{appointmentTimeFrame,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NUM_SUM = #{orderNumSum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_NUM_NOW = #{orderNumNow,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID as id , APPOINTMENT_DATE as appointmentDate, APPOINTMENT_TIME_FRAME as appointmentTimeFrame, ORDER_NUM_SUM as orderNumSum, ORDER_NUM_NOW as orderNumNow from appointment_info where APPOINTMENT_DATE = str_to_date(#{appointmentDate},'%Y-%m-%d')

select distinct APPOINTMENT_DATE as appointmentDate from appointment_info where APPOINTMENT_DATE >= str_to_date(#{appointmentDateStart},'%Y-%m-%d') and APPOINTMENT_DATE <= str_to_date(#{appointmentDateEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
select ORDER_NUM_SUM as orderNumSum, ORDER_NUM_NOW as orderNumNow from appointment_info where ID = #{id}
